mapper.select: SELECT T1.PDLV_DV_CD /* 출고지구분코드 */ , T1.PDLV_NO /* 출고지번호 */ , T1.APY_STRTDT /* 적용시작일자 */ , T1.APY_ENDDT /* 적용종료일자 */ , T1.PDLV_NM /* 출고지명 */ , T1.ZIP /* 우편번호 */ , T1.PDLV_ADR /* 출고지주소 */ , T1.PDLV_DTL_ADR /* 출고지상세주소 */ , T1.CNR_OG_ID /* 센터조직ID */ , T1.LAWC_EMD_NM /* 읍면동명 */ , T1.ILD_YN /* 섬구분 */ , T1.FST_RGST_DTM /* 최초등록일시 */ , T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID /* 최초등록사용자ID */ , T1.CTPV_NM , T1.CTCTY_NM FROM ( SELECT 'Z' AS PDLV_DV_CD, '4128112000106710047012679' AS PDLV_NO, '20220201' AS APY_STRTDT, '99991231' AS APY_ENDDT, '고양 덕양' AS PDLV_NM, NULL AS ZIP, '경기도 고양시 덕양구 호수로 77-7' AS PDLV_ADR, NULL AS PDLV_DTL_ADR, NULL AS CNR_OG_ID, NULL AS LAWC_EMD_NM, NULL AS ILD_YN, '20220321104308' AS FST_RGST_DTM, '37615' AS FST_RGST_USR_ID, '경기도' AS CTPV_NM, '덕양구' AS CTCTY_NM FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Z','4215011100112780147012638','20220201','99991231','강릉',NULL,'강원도 강릉시 성덕포남로 152번길 25-1',NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,'20220321104309','37615', '강원도', '강릉시' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Z','4213032021104700002000001','20220201','99991231','원주',NULL,'강원도 원주시 호저면 호저로 394-1',NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,'20220321104309','37615', '강원도', '원주시' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Z','4145010200101760000000001','20220201','99991231','하남',NULL,'경기도 하남시 하산곡로 31',NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,'20220321104309','37615', '경기도', '하남시' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Z','4159012600101670007000001','20220201','99991231','화성',NULL,'경기도 화성시 효행로 556-28',NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,'20220321104309','37615', '경기도', '화성시' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Z','5011025325115000003000001','20220201','99991231','제주',NULL,'제주특별자치도 제주시 애월읍 엄장로 225',NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,'20220321104309','37615', '제주특별자치도', '제주시' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Z','3611036030101710005000001','20220201','99991231','세종',NULL,'세종특별자치시 연서면 부국길 119-1',NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,'20220321104310','37615', '세종특별자치시', '연서면' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Z','4313033521102420031000001','20220201','99991231','충주',NULL,'충청북도 충주시 대소원면 대소원1길 19',NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,'20220321104310','37615', '충청북도', '충주시' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Z','4511312900106140003000001','20220201','99991231','전주',NULL,'전라북도 전주시 덕진구 삼례로 116',NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,'20220321104311','37615', '전라북도', '전주시' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Z','2824510400102200000000001','20220201','99991231','인천계양',NULL,'인천광역시 계양구 서운산단로 2길 62',NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,'20220329183749','36696', '인천광역시', '계양구' FROM DUAL ) T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.PDLV_DV_CD = 'Z' AND T1.CTPV_NM = #{ctpvNm} AND T1.CTCTY_NM = #{ctctyNm}
